Herald

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Herald Dirothes
  • Appearance: Butcher Dirothes is a stout middle-aged man. The only hair on his head is a big dark moustache, right under his nose. Like most butchers, Herald can usually be seen wearing a dirty white apron, covered in blood. Underneath he wears an equally messy wifebeater and simple brown pants, being held up with a thick leather belt. The belt is adorned with various carving and cutting tools.
  • Character: Herald is an industrious man, who often jokingly talks about the Dirothes Meat Emporium. Even though he only owns a small butcher shop in a simple neighbourhood, he is always jumping on the latest trend in meatwards. Herald Dirothes always manages to see the financial benefit of a plan ... evne if there really is nothing to gain. Despite his grand dreams and keen eye for oppertunity, the poor man simply doesn't know how to invest wisely and always quickly squanders his money with another elaborate plan.
  • Past: Herald was forced away from his mother and travelled the roads at the very early age of five. As the son of a renown warrior, Isoren Dirothes, he had to be readied for 'the tough life' and he definitely had a tough time living up to his father's dreams. He never became decent fighter material since Herald simply didn't have the motivation to push himself to the limit every time over. To the annoyance of his father and many of his warrior friends, who attempted to train the boy. At the age of 17, Herald's father disappeared after an escort mission. The young man saw this as his oppertunity to start his own life and stayed in Vaaloria to become a butcher.
